Interface IGuiController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiController
public interface IGuiController
Interface for GUI controllers that manage the game view. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP) to decouple high-level game logic from low-level GUI details.

Implementations handle:

  • Game controller integration
  • View initialization
  • Board refresh
  • Game over display
See Also:
  • GuiController
  • IGameController

    • setGameController

      void setGameController(IGameController gameController)
      Sets the game controller for handling game logic.
      Parameters:
      gameController - the game controller to use

    • initGameView

      void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData viewData)
      Initializes the game view with the board state and brick data.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the initial board state
      viewData - the initial brick and preview data

    • refreshGameBackground

      void refreshGameBackground(int[][] boardMatrix)
      Refreshes the game board background display.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the current board state
